description:
Fall and flannel go together like chocolate and peanut butter, pancakes and maple syrup, puppies and kittens, they’re one of life’s perfect pairings. Crafted from a soft midweight cotton flannel, the Carrillon HF shirt is one that you will just keep finding reasons to wear.

  • Soft cotton flannel uses hollow yarns that trap warm air
  • Dual chest pockets are there for your sunnies and cards
  • Uses Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) cotton. The BCI is a not-for-profit association committed to a holistic approach to sustainable cotton production
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
  • Regular fit wears like and old favourite
name: Kathmandu Carrillon HF Long Sleeve Shirt - Women's
